CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Program_Size__c >=1, ISPICKVAL(Duration_of_Overallocation__c, "Full Month")),500, IF(AND(Program_Size__c <1, ISPICKVAL(Duration_of_Overallocation__c, "Full Month")),250, IF(AND(Program_Size__c>=1,ISPICKVAL(Duration_of_Overallocation__c, "Half Month")),250, IF(AND(Program_Size__c <1, ISPICKVAL(Duration_of_Overallocation__c, "Half Month")),125, 0))))
CustomField.label: Compensation for Over-Allocated Hours
